search_general_talk_story_30/4401_0701_0:
Rosa and the others are waiting for you. Try
talking to as many teammates as you can!
I’m sure they’d be happy to chat with you!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0701_0:
Perfect timing, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You should join us!

Yeah! Blaine is getting us pumped up with some
motivational shouts!
Pssh. As if we’re not super pumped up already!

Fools! Don’t forget, our team is facing off against
a team led by a living legend—Red!

You can never be too pumped up for an opponent
like that!
Wow! Is Red really that strong?

Indeed he is! He doesn’t speak much, but his soul
is always on fire!

If you don’t want to get burned, join me in stoking
the fire in our hearts! Hah!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0701_1: Let’s give it all we’ve got!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0401_1: Nice! But I can do even better than that!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0302_1: Let’s give it all we’ve got!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0402_1: Yeah! You’re exploding with energy now!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0701_1: Good! We’re almost there, but it’s still not enough!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0701_2: Let’s do that a hundred more times! Get ready!

At this rate, we’re gonna burn out before the
battle even starts!
search_general_talk_story_30/4402_0102_0: Let’s give it all we’ve got!
How long are we gonna do this?!
search_general_talk_story_30/4403_0701_0:
Oh, you made it, kid. Could you humor this guy for
a moment?

Before you head off to your big match, wanna see
what lady luck’s got in store for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

I’ll flip a coin. If you guess right, you win, and
that means you’ll also win the finals.

Get it wrong, and you lose...and unfortunately,
you also lose the finals.
search_general_talk_story_30/4403_0701_1:
OK, I may have rigged it... But it probably
helped boost your confidence, right?

*sigh* I know you’re doing this to be nice and all,
but you really shouldn’t lie.

I’m a police officer. I can spot a shady trick like
that from a mile away.
Heh... Guess nothing gets past you, Nanu.

The kid’ll do fine, even without that little trick
of yours.

[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He’s" F="She’s" ] been leading a team with this old man,
after all!
I gotta admit, you make a convincing argument.

I guess you didn’t really need any help... Let’s just
forget it happened.
search_general_talk_story_30/4403_0701_2:
I’m gonna enjoy watching you battle out there in
your big match!
search_general_talk_story_30/4403_0102_0:
The kid and the rest of the team are ready to pull
us through. They don’t really need an old man like
me, to be honest.
Heh. You don’t really mean that, do you?
search_general_talk_story_30/4404_0701_0:
I wanna get to the arena already, but Erika and
Valerie are taking their sweet time!
It’s fine, Barry. We still have time to get there.

Haste makes waste... And before such an
important battle, you have to make sure...
to...relax...

Hey! Don’t fall asleep here! That’s way
TOO relaxed!
I agree. Erika, it’s time for the finals.

If my Sylveon were to battle in the finals, I know
it would...
search_general_talk_story_30/4404_0701_1:
Helloooo! Earth to Valerie! We can’t exactly read
your mind, y’know!

You two are way too spacey! Get your heads out
of the clouds!
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0701_0:
*chuckle* One more win, and our team will
become the champions!

And once I’m a champion, I can also call myself
the strongest dragon master of them all!

Clair, winning the PML is a team effort. Even if we
win, there won’t be any individual titles.

Hey, aren’t you the leader of our team? If you
say the word, everyone else will have to go along
with it!

How about it? If we become the champions of the
PML, will you let me call myself the world’s
strongest dragon master?
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0401_0:
I knew it! I knew I made the right choice in
following your lead, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0402_1:
Oh, come on! Why not? I’ve been working hard
for the team, haven’t I?
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0701_1:
Oh, oh! Then I wanna be called “the strongest girl
who knows the hearts of dragons”!
Yes, I don’t see why not, Iris.

How about this? After the finals, why don’t we
bring all the dragon masters together and have a
friendly competition?

Oooh, good idea! There are a lot of dragon
masters here on Pasio! Let’s contact ’em all!

There’s Drake and Cynthia... And of course, we
can’t forget Lance!

H-hold on a second! If I have to do all that for the
title, it doesn’t matter if we win the finals or not!
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0102_0:
You’re already thinking about what to do after
the finals...
search_general_talk_story_30/4405_0702_0:
But I suppose that enthusiasm and spirit of
self-improvement is something I can learn from!
search_general_talk_story_30/4406_0701_0: Are you excited for the finals, Calem?
Yeah! I sure am, Big Sis!

Ho? I didn’t know you were Calem’s older
sister, Acerola!

Hey, do you want to be Calem’s big sis,
too, Hapu?
Ho! I can be Calem’s big sister, too? In that case...

Calem, think of me as a big sister! You can
count on me!

Uh... I mean, you do have that reliable big sister
aura, Hapu.
search_general_talk_story_30/4406_0701_1: Let’s do our best, Big Sisters!
search_general_talk_story_30/4406_0702_0: Our team’s power will be a sight to behold!
Yeah! You’ve got the support of your big sisters!
search_general_talk_story_30/4407_0701_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], look! Elesa came to
see you before your big match!
I’ve thought of the perfect way to wish you luck!

But first, you have to answer a little question of
mine. Which do you like better, Absol
or Exeggcute?
search_general_talk_story_30/4407_0401_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you defeated us to
win your spot onstage in the finals...
So you Absol-utely have got to win for all of us!
search_general_talk_story_30/4407_0402_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you beat our team,
so we know you have what it takes to win
this thing.

Even if Red is your opponent, you can still beat
him if you Exeggcute your moves properly!
search_general_talk_story_30/4407_0701_1: There it is! Elesa strikes again with a full-on pun!

It’s time for you to take off and really soar in this
final battle! Let’s do it for everyone cheering on
our team!
search_general_talk_story_30/4408_0701_0:
He got charged up on electricity from Sophocles’s
Togedemaru and Clemont’s Heliolisk!

They both said they’re definitely gonna watch our 
team in the finals!

Look at these sync pairs amped up and ready to
take the stage!

You’ve been taking a lot of photos... Are you sure
you won’t run out of film?
Don’t worry—I came fully prepared today!

I’ll capture every moment on camera, from the
most harrowing to the most triumphant!
search_general_talk_story_30/4408_0701_1: You really love photography, don’t you.

But if you’re taking all the photos, who’s going to
take one with you in it?
How about we take some pictures for you?

On a day like this, I suppose it could be fun to
be on the opposite side of the lens!
search_general_talk_story_30/4408_0702_0:
I’d usually offer to use this opportunity to gather
more data for Soffy and Clemont...

But given the occasion, I think I’ll prioritize
enjoying the battle instead!
That’s totally fine, Molayne! Let’s give it our all!
Focus on the battle, and give it your all! Fantastic!
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0701_0:
Hmm... It appears everyone is a bit on edge
because of the finals.

Yeah. But at times like these, we adults have to
stay calm and collected!
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0401_0:
Thanks. You don’t seem any different than usual, 
so I’m not worried about you at all.
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0402_0:
Hahaha! Well, I may not look it, but I do happen
to be a member of the Elite Four, so I’m used to
the pressure that comes with battles like this.
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0701_1:
Janine?! I thought you were out on a journey to
train yourself!

I decided to take the day off. After all, the big
battle is today!
Here, I made you some lunch!
I hope your team wins, Dad!

Mom couldn’t be here today, but I’ll be sure to
cheer your team on enough for both of us!
We’ll be watching the live stream! See ya!

Well... I suppose I may still have a lot to learn
after all.

Me too. Now that I’ve heard all that from
my son...
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0701_2: I have to support my team as much as I can!

We’ll show everyone the true extent of our
fatherly support in the finals!
search_general_talk_story_30/4409_0702_0:
Fwahahaha! I’m looking forward to showing off
the true power of my ninja techniques!
search_general_talk_story_30/4410_0701_0:
It’s almost over, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Only one more match to go.

If we win this match, our team will become the
first champions of the PML.

Y’know, many people aspire to become a
champion, but only a handful actually achieve it.

But you’ve all earned yourselves the chance to
battle for it, through the power of your friendship
and teamwork!

Put everything on the line, and beat Red’s
team, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_story_30/4410_0401_0: I sincerely hope it’s your team that wins this.
search_general_talk_story_30/4410_0402_0:
Have some confidence. It wasn’t luck or a
coincidence that brought you here.
search_general_talk_story_30/4410_0701_1: Elesa, Grimsley, Cynthia, and even Lear...

By defeating each of their teams, we learned
something about what made them strong, and
we were able to incorporate it into our strategy!

We can win this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s become a team of champions!
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0701_0:
Was everyone OK? They weren’t nervous or
anything, were they?
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0401_0:
That’s great to hear. But of course, having a bit
of nervous energy can sometimes help in battle.
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0402_0:
I see! I guess with such a big battle ahead,
everyone must be more excited than usual.
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0701_0: That’s probably better than getting cold feet!

OK, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We’re up against
Red and his team.

Come to think of it, did you know I’m the first
Gym Leader they ever challenged?
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0401_1:
Yup. There’s a Gym in Viridian City, which is
between Pallet Town and my Gym, but the Gym
Leader there was absent at the time.

So instead they faced me in their first battle for a
Gym Badge.

What I noticed about Red wasn’t that he was
strong but that he was gifted as a Trainer.
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0402_1:
Well... I’d like to say yes, but actually, they had
just become Trainers at the time.

With Red, what really stood out to me wasn’t that
he was strong but that he seemed very gifted as
a Trainer.
I felt the same when I first met you, too.
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0701_1:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Red are kinda
similar, in a way.
search_general_talk_story_30/4411_0701_2:
Red, Blue, and Leaf are from Pallet Town, and
they’re all excellent Trainers.

But no need to worry. You’re one of Pasio’s finest
Trainers—or rather, finest sync pairs!

Use everything you’ve learned on Pasio and bring
it to the final battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0701_0:
I can’t believe we finally made it to the
PML finals...

Ever since I met you, I’ve had grand dreams of
battling in that arena...

And then we went on a journey to collect all
five PML badges...

Of course it was a lot of fun, but it didn’t always
go as planned. We ran into quite a few obstacles
along the way.

But overcoming all of that only strengthened our
bond as a team!

It seemed like a long journey, but it was
surprisingly short... And now it’s coming
to an end with this final match!

Let’s make this last battle of our PML journey a
resounding victory!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0301_0: We’ll give it our best shot!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0401_1: Yeah! I promise to give it my all!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0302_1: Let’s get out there and win this!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0402_1: Yeah! I promise to give it my all!
search_general_talk_story_30/4412_0701_1:
Red’s team is waiting for us! Time to head to
the arena!
